---
title: "Browse Packages"
include-in-header:
  - text: |
      <link rel="stylesheet" href="https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/npm/bootstrap-icons@1.11.0/font/bootstrap-icons.css">
---

<div class="browse-page">

<div class="browse-header">
<p class="browse-subtitle">Explore R packages organized by category</p>
</div>

<div class="browse-controls">
<div class="browse-actions">
<button class="browse-action-btn" onclick="expandAllSections()">
<i class="bi bi-arrows-expand"></i> Expand All
</button>
<button class="browse-action-btn" onclick="collapseAllSections()">
<i class="bi bi-arrows-collapse"></i> Collapse All
</button>
</div>
</div>

<div id="browse-container" class="browse-container">
<!-- Dynamic content loaded by browse.js -->
<div class="browse-loading">
<div class="loading-spinner"></div>
<p>Loading categories...</p>
</div>
</div>

</div>

<script src="../js/browse.js"></script>
